metadata.title: CVE-2017-11110 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The ole_init function in ole.c in catdoc 0.95 allows remote attackers tocause a denial of service (heap-based buffer underflow and applicationcrash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted file, i.e.,data is written to memory addresses before the beginning of the tmpBufbuffer.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-11110` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

catdoc - 1:0.94.3~git20160113.dbc9ec6+dfsg-1+deb9u1build0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: catdoc package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:0.94.3~git20160113.dbc9ec6+dfsg-1+deb9u1build0.16.04.1').
